summary: When a young schoolgirl is raped and murdered, the mateship between a group of surfers is tested as the truth is slowly revealed.
cast: Laurence Breuls|Linda Cropper|Simon Lyndon|Chris Haywood|Rebecca Smart|Jeanette Cronin|David Field|Justine Clarke|Essie Davis|Jessica Napier|Bojana Novakovic|Shayne Francis|John Howard|Geoff Morrell|Cameron Nugent|Brendan Donoghue|Jade Gatt|George Basha|Leeanna Walsman|Nichole Stewart|Heath Ledger|Pip Branson|John O'Hare|Kate Sheil|Kellie Bright|Philip Dodd|Lucia Mastrantone|Brian Meegan|Daniel Carlin|Sophie Wiesner|Tyson McConkey|Julie Haseler|Ritchie Singer|Stavros Economidis|Gina Bortolin|Douglas Hedge|Harold Hopkins|Paul Jones|Kim Lewis|Mikey Robins|Sacha Horler|Johnathan Devoy|Denise Kirby|Alvaro Marques|Sidewinder|Phil Mobbs|Aaron Carter|Mark Stanborough|Julie Gray|Richard Lambeth|Christian Stead|Jessica Schwarz|Katie Chesters|Claudia Kharbat|Andrew Byrne|Ineke Rapp|Steve Rutherford
title: Blackrock
